entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:39 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 12:51 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure: 97.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: N 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
